data.prayer: Lord, make the 313,959 believers in Zhanjiang to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 3,824,642 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhanjiang, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Zhanjiang, Guangdong, China to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Zhanjiang, Guangdong, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Over 90.8 percent of the people of Zhanjiang are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, remember the Zhuang, Eastern Hongshuihe people. Make the Zhuang, Eastern Hongshuihe people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Zhanjiang, Guangdong, China.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Zhanjiang against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Zhanjiang who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

location.name: Zhanjiang
location.people_groups_list: Lakkia, Tibetan, Jew, French-speaking, Ban Yao, Iu Mien, Changping
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Lakkia (14,000), Tibetan (2,000), Jew, French-speaking (800), Ban Yao (37,000), Iu Mien, Changping (30,000)
